"Mobile Cannon M2":
"Mobile Cannon M2s are powerful special weapons that can be summoned from Delivery Devices.

While equipped with one, you cannot access your normal weapons and gain a special dedicated moveset instead."

"Mobile Cannons have the following abilities:

Rapid Fire: A Normal Attack that can be fired continuously
Multi-Lock Missile: A missile attack that can lock on to multiple targets.
Ultra High Jump: An action that lets you jump high into the air.
Hyper Blaster: A powerful beam attack that can only be used once.
Counter Barrage: Evading an enemy attack with a Step will automatically counterattack with a Counter Bullet, recovering a large amount of PP."

"Each Mobile Cannon M2 you use can only be equipped for a limited time.

You can select \"Arms Release\" from your Subpalette to unequip it early, and it will also be unequipped if you are incapacitated."
